physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#978 Henry and Mildred Schoen born c. 1890[Henry] Born 1893[Mildred].'' On photograph: ''Ben's store & annex, #978.''

mods.abstract: Ben Schoen's clothing store with window displays of hats, jackets, and pants. The sign says: ''Hats, men's boys' & children's clothing, B. Schoen, High class custom tailoring, Shoes.''
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
